text:
[Verse]
Sky turns gold as day falls down
Silent streets in quiet town
Winds whispering soft and low
Where do all the sunsets go

[Verse]
Footsteps echo on the road
Carrying dreams heavy load
Lost in twilight's fading glow
Chasing time we never know

[Chorus]
Oh we're chasing sunsets
Running with the light
In the colors of the night
Chasing sunsets

[Verse]
Shadows stretch like fingertips
Hope is written on our lips
Stars appearing one by one
In the dance of moon and sun

[Verse]
Hearts beat to a slower tune
As we sing under the moon
Watching the horizon blend
In a moment without end

[Chorus]
Oh we're chasing sunsets
Running with the light
In the colors of the night
Chasing sunsets
title: Chasing Sunsets
